title: FermiHDI License Request Schema
description: The JSON Schema description needed to request a license from FermiHDI

customerID.description: The Customer ID for the license being requested

licenseID.description: The ID of the license being requested

licenseFingerprint.description: License's base64 encoded SHA-512 fingerprint less 'licenses.dms' and 'licenses.licenseVerification'

hd.description: Request for an HD License (Only one product per request is allowed)

dmsCSR.description: The Base64 encoded PEM formated Certificate Signing Request for the FermiHDI HD DMS assocated with this license; Note that the Public Key included in the CSR will be used to encrypt the license.
